data.actual_result: When you type any emojis, there is another emoji layered below.
data.expected_result: When you type any emojis, there shouldn’t be another emoji layered below.
data.short_description: Any emoji characters gets doubled layered when you type them in “Add Friend” box.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your Friends list. - Click on the add friend icon. (White icon at the very top right.) - Type any emoji character in the box.
